Using the [R](https://www.r-project.org/) programming language, i write algorithms that guide a machine to create drawings from data. Each execution produces a different result. By transforming data into ink on paper, i strive to [explore](posts/works/statement/index.qmd) the creative possibilities at the intersection of data visualisation and technology.
::: {.asterism} ⁂ ::: ### Series {#section-process .hero-heading} ::: {#list-process} ::: ### Systems {#section-systems .hero-heading} ::: {#list-systems} :::
